CheckTitle: Server Side Excludes is enabled to hide sensitive content from bots
Description: Verifies that Server Side Excludes (Scrape Shield) is enabled to automatically hide content wrapped in SSE tags from visitors identified as suspicious bots or crawlers.
Risk: Without Server Side Excludes, sensitive content marked for exclusion remains visible to malicious bots and crawlers that may scrape, index, or misuse the information.

Recommendation.Text: Enable Server Side Excludes and wrap sensitive content in SSE HTML comments. This provides selective content protection while maintaining full functionality for legitimate visitors.

Notes: Server Side Excludes requires wrapping sensitive content with special HTML comments to mark content for exclusion.
